decks.notes: The deck aims to disrupt opponent's strategy with a combination of removal spells and counterspells, while also applying pressure with aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd. The deck also utilizes powerful creatures like Quantum Riddler and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury to quickly close out the game. Teferi, Time Raveler provides additional disruption and tempo advantage, while Fable of the Mirror-Breaker offers card advantage. The mana base is streamlined to ensure consistent access to all colors of mana for the spells in the deck.

This deck focuses on quickly and aggressively dealing damage to the opponent using cheap spells and efficient creatures. It uses cards like Monastery Swiftspear and Dragon's Rage Channeler to pressure the opponent early on, while maintaining card advantage with cards like Expressive Iteration and Mishra's Bauble. The deck also includes burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart to finish off the opponent. The key strategy is to constantly apply pressure and force the opponent to react while steadily advancing towards victory.

This deck focuses on controlling the board through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and creatures with disruptive abilities. By drawing cards, disrupting their opponent's plays, and removing threats efficiently, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent until it can secure a win condition. The deck utilizes a mix of versatile removal spells, disruptive creatures, and powerful planeswalkers to maintain control over the game and dictate the pace of play.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying disruptive creatures that hinder the opponent's resources, while also pressuring them with aggressive threats. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while quickly building up a board presence to close out the game. Cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Prismatic Ending provide disruption, while creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury apply pressure. The deck also includes removal spells and card advantage engines to control the board and maintain tempo.

The deck focuses on a fast-paced aggressive strategy by using cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls to quickly build a board presence and apply pressure to the opponent. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Blood Moon and Goblin Bombardment helps disrupt the opponent's game plan and deal additional damage. The deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures and burn spells, while also utilizing cards like Seasoned Pyromancer and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah for card advantage and powerful effects.

Utilizing cards that allow for instant reanimation of powerful creatures, this deck focuses on quickly bringing back key threats such as Griselbrand and Atraxa, Grand Unifier to overwhelm opponents. By combining cards like Faithful Mending, Goryo's Vengeance, and Ephemerate, the deck aims to create explosive plays and generate value through creatures with powerful abilities. The use of counterspells like Force of Negation and disruption with cards like Thoughtseize and Teferi, Time Raveler helps protect the combo pieces and disrupt opponents' strategies. Overall, the deck aims to win through efficient and explosive plays using instant reanimation.

This deck focuses on quickly reanimating powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Atraxa, Grand Unifier using cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Fallaji Archaeologist. Utilizing instant spells like Solitude and Prismatic Ending to control the board while setting up the combo. Ephemerate and Tainted Indulgence help protect key creatures and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to win by quickly overwhelming the opponent with powerful creatures while maintaining control of the game through disruption and protection spells.

This deck focuses on using a combination of aggressive creatures and disruption spells to control the game and overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Consign to Memory to control the opponent's board, while also utilizing powerful creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer to pressure the opponent's life total, this deck aims to quickly close out games before the opponent has a chance to stabilize. The diverse mana base allows for flexibility in casting spells and activating abilities, ensuring a strong and consistent game plan.

The deck focuses on quickly getting powerful creatures like Griselbrand onto the battlefield by using cards like Goryo's Vengeance and instant reanimation spells. It also includes control elements like Force of Negation and Thoughtseize to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The goal is to combo off and overwhelm the opponent with big threats while also having the ability to protect your own game plan. Additionally, the deck includes some synergistic cards like Ephemerate and Solitude to provide additional value and answers to threats.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature plays and burn spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The key strategy is to utilize low-cost creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls to deal early damage, while also having access to removal and disruption with cards like Goblin Bombardment and Blood Moon. Ajani, Nacatl Pariah provides additional token generation and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury acts as a powerful finisher. The deck aims to maintain pressure and control the board to secure a fast victory.

This deck focuses on quickly getting aggressive creatures on the board while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Prismatic Ending. It also utilizes powerful removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Solitude to control the board. The key strategy is to apply pressure with creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd while using cards like Consign to Memory and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to maintain card advantage. The deck aims to win quickly by overwhelming the opponent with a combination of aggro and disruptive elements.

This deck focuses on aggressive plays with a mix of powerful creatures and instant removal spells. The key strategy is to quickly deploy efficient threats like Doorkeeper Thrull, Scion of Draco, and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer to pressure the opponent early on. Leyline Binding and Leyline of the Guildpact help to protect your creatures and maintain board control. Additional spells like Stubborn Denial and Lightning Bolt provide additional disruption to slow down the opponent's game plan. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast, aggressive game plan.

This Modern Aggro - Affinity deck focuses on quickly deploying a variety of artifact creatures and utilizing artifacts to control the board and disrupt the opponent. With a mixture of low-cost creatures, artifact synergy cards, and utility artifacts, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain a strong board presence while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Pithing Needle and Tormod's Crypt. The deck also benefits from card draw with Thoughtcast and Emry, Lurker of the Loch, ensuring it can keep up the pressure throughout the game.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying artifact creatures and generating a high amount of mana to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. By utilizing cards like Mox Opal, Urza's Saga, and Springleaf Drum, the deck can ramp up quickly and put pressure on the opponent. It also includes disruption spells like Metallic Rebuke and Engineered Explosives to control the board and protect its own threats. The versatile artifact package allows for flexibility in adapting to different game states, making it a powerful and versatile aggro strategy in the Modern format.

The deck focuses on utilizing Leyline cards to boost the power of multicolored creatures and spells, creating a fast and aggressive playstyle. With cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Territorial Kavu, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures and direct damage spells like Lightning Bolt. The inclusion of Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding helps to further enhance the deck's overall strategy, while Stubborn Denial provides protection against opposing spells. The deck's mana base is optimized to support its aggressive game plan and ensure consistent casting of its powerful spells.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan by utilizing a combination of hand disruption, removal spells, and flicker effects. It also aims to put pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures that have powerful abilities. The deck utilizes a mana base that supports both white and black spells, allowing for flexibility in casting its diverse array of cards. By combining disruptive elements with aggressive threats, this deck aims to control the game and dictate the pace of play, ultimately overwhelming the opponent and securing victory.
